text:
[Verse]
Stars up in the sky so bright
Moonlight guiding us tonight
Road ahead so clear so wide
In this car let's take a ride

[Verse]
Engine hums a gentle tune
Windows down we're chasing moons
City lights so far behind
Lost in dreams we will find

[Chorus]
Midnight drive we're feeling free
No one else just you and me
Singing songs to the night sky
In this moment we can fly

[Verse]
Speeding past the sleeping towns
Jukebox playing louder sounds
Vibrations echo in our hearts
In this car we're making art

[Bridge]
Wind it whispers secret tales
Through the night we blaze the trails
Memories we'll make tonight
In this car we'll take our flight

[Chorus]
Midnight drive we're feeling free
No one else just you and me
Singing songs to the night sky
In this moment we can fly
title: Midnight Drive
